data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Mateussi, Nadayca T. B., Oliveira, Claudio, Pavanelli, Carla S. (2018): Taxonomic revision of the Cis-Andean species of Mylossoma Eigenmann & Kennedy, 1903 (Teleostei: Characiformes: Serrasalmidae). Zootaxa 4387 (2): 275-309, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4387.2.3|97 occurrences
